review.summary: This is an exemplary API module __init__.py file that serves as the public interface for the actions API components. It provides clean, well-organized imports and exports for models (requests/responses), routers (admin/tenant/internal), and dependency injection functions. The file follows neo-commons platform conventions perfectly with comprehensive __all__ list for explicit public API control.

positive_observations.observation: Comprehensive __all__ list with clear categorization (Models, Routers, Dependencies with subcategories)
Perfect adherence to neo-commons import patterns with feature-based organization
Clear separation of concerns: requests/responses, routers by role, and dependency injection
Consistent naming conventions following neo-commons patterns (get_* for dependencies)
Clean module docstring that clearly identifies purpose
Well-structured imports with logical grouping and proper relative imports

context.tests: No tests required for __init__.py module interface file
context.documentation: Module docstring present and appropriate for API interface
context.configuration: No configuration needed - pure import/export module
